headlines.text: Versatile UI / Front End developer with over 9 years of experience in front-end development in web and mobile.

objectives.text: Seeking a position among top-notch team of developers, to utilize my skills, and abilities to create cutting-edge web and mobile applications. The Ideal position should challenge me to learn and adapt, and fulfill my cravings to learn new technologies and constant self-improvement.

summary.text: Expert in HTML5, XHTML, CSS, CSS3, LESS CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX and JSON.
Experience with React, Alt js and ES6 standards.
Build automation with Node, Grunt, Gulp and Webpack.
An earnest believer in clean coding standards, semantic HTML and CSS and conventions, W3C standards and best practices.
In-depth knowledge in Responsive Web Design techniques, cross-browser compatibility and browser quirks, Accessibility, cross device compatibility, SEO, site optimization.
Knowledge of other MV* frameworks like Angular, Backbone and templating like moustache, handlebars JS.
Worked in various development models including Agile Development (Scrum) - as scrum master.
Good understanding of git repositories and git process.
Built HTML5 applications with RESTful services.
Expert at design tools like Photoshop and Illustrator.

projects.title: Persuit
projects.headline: This is still under development and is a revolutionary approach at professional services. This started as a backbone app and we later migrated to React.js.
responsibilities: Build simple to complex features with new or existing components in react according to the specs.
Style various features and pages of the project using SASS, with support for mobile, tablet and desktop form factors.
Adhere to coding and development process standards. Create pull request and review other pull requests.
Introduced the team to agile and scrum methodology and adopted a hybrid process meeting the project needs.
Write unit tests for testable features.

highlights: Ensuring adherence to software quality standards and best practices and keep the team motivated and productive.
To ensure the features developed by the team are produced to the highest possible quality in the fastest possible time and no less.
Provide solutions and support to different projects and developers on different areas like Responsive Web design, project architecture and design, approaches and framework.
Evaluate different technologies and techniques for projects and suggest the most optimum solution.
Decide and work on frameworks and architecture of project, so that the team could work on it further.
Conceptualize and design user interface for enhancement of the web/mobile applications and create wireframes.
Develop applications with clean hand coded XHTML and CSS and enhance UI with JQuery effects, Ajax and other dynamic content with clean CSS. Also ensured cross browser compatibility and debugging
Saw end-to-end development right from gathering requirement, analysis, design, implementation, debugging to deployment.

Design and develop Web 2.0 Layouts for PHP based web-applications and CMSs like Magento, Zen Cart, Joomla, Wordpress and Drupal using clean hand coded XHTML, JavaScript and CSS. Also ensure cross browser compatibility and debugging
Worked with jQuery Ajax, menus, slider, slide shows and other dynamic content with CSS.
